exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a plank position. Keep your core tight and body straight.

exercises.name: Walk
exercises.description: Walk around or use the treadmill. Keep a brisk pace.

exercises.name: Stretch
exercises.description: Full body stretch. Focus on neck, shoulders, back, and legs.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Do push-ups at your own pace. Modify as needed.

exercises.name: Neck Stretch
exercises.description: Gently tilt your head left, right, forward, and back.

exercises.name: Stand & Walk
exercises.description: Stand up and walk around briefly.
